channel.title: Problems with client 508 ip changer
channel.description: okay heres my problem. ive download winrar and newest java from www.java.com ive extracted the Ip changer But when i click run . A black Screen Popsup With java blablalbla interne or batch ? And the client doesnt load. Please someone help. im searching already a week! :(

item.title: Problems with client 508 ip changer
item.dc:creator: @runeboy66 runeboy66
item.description:
@runeboy66 wrote:

Ip changers have some simple problems that are easy to fix even if you are new to 508 coding just put your 317 client knowledge to work!
Well with batch errors they are easy, when you open the client folder you should have another folder the name is usually “files” or it might be “bin” or even sometimes “data”
well enough of your problems it is solved!
when you open the client folder do you see a batch file named Run.bat? or Build.bat(compiler)? if so ignore the build one and right click run.bat
you should then see a notepad document or wordpad depending on which system there should be some text similar to this, (@echo off
Title Runeboy66’s ultimate ip changer!
cd files
java -Xmx256m client 66 live live software members english game1
pause)Copy this into your run.bat and it should fix if not ile give you my ip changer download link.
p-s it maybe to do with your cache folder or the java files…
~runeboy66~

Read full topic
